question: [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotingRecord] [Orphaned Records] Can voting records exist in state without corresponding voting items, causing inconsistencies when cross-referencing? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotingResult] [Snapshot Gaps] Can VotingResults have missing snapshot numbers, causing queries for intermediate snapshots to return null unexpectedly? (Low)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotedItems] [Vote ID References] Can VotedItems reference vote IDs that no longer exist in VotingRecords after data cleanup? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetLatestVotingResult] [CurrentSnapshotNumber Validity] If CurrentSnapshotNumber exceeds TotalSnapshotNumber, can this method return results for invalid snapshots? (Medium)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotingIds] [Stale Mappings] Can VotedItemVoteIds contain outdated entries for voting items that have been deleted or ended? (Low)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotingRecords] [Empty Input] What happens if input.Ids is an empty list - does it return empty VotingRecords or fail? (Low)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotingResult] [Zero Snapshot] Does the method handle SnapshotNumber = 0 correctly, or can this cause undefined behavior? (Low)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotingResult] [Negative Snapshot] Can input.SnapshotNumber be negative, causing hash computation issues or retrieval of wrong data? (Medium)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotedItems] [Invalid Address] Does the method validate that the input Address is a valid blockchain address format? (Low)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotingIds] [Null Input Fields] Are there null checks for input.Voter and input.VotingItemId before ToHex() calls? (Medium)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotingRecords] [Max Array Size] What is the maximum size of input.Ids before the method fails or runs out of gas? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotedItems] [Large VotedItems] If a voter has participated in thousands of voting items, can returning the entire VotedItems cause issues? (Medium)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotingItem] [Expired Items] Can this method retrieve voting items where EndTimestamp has passed, and should expired items be hidden? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotingResult] [Snapshot Beyond Total] Can querying snapshot numbers greater than TotalSnapshotNumber return valid results or cause errors? (Low)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetLatestVotingResult] [Zero Total Snapshots] If TotalSnapshotNumber is 0, can this cause CurrentSnapshotNumber to be invalid? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotingRecord + GetVotingIds] [Complete Voter Profiling] Can combining these methods enable building complete voter profiles including all voting activity, amounts, and choices? (Critical)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotedItems + GetVotingRecords] [Voter Deanonymization] Can cross-referencing voted items with voting records enable deanonymization in anonymous voting scenarios? (Critical)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotingResult + GetLatestVotingResult] [Vote Timing Analysis] Can comparing historical and latest results enable timing analysis of individual votes? (High)
[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [All View Methods] [Metadata Leakage] Do error messages, null returns, and success patterns leak metadata about contract state structure? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [All View Methods] [Regulatory Compliance] Do these methods violate data protection regulations (GDPR, etc.) by enabling unrestricted access to personal voting data? (High)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotingRecord] [Quadratic Vote Tracking] For quadratic voting items, does exposing Amount in VotingRecord reveal the sequential vote number for that voter? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotingItem] [IsQuadratic Exploitation] Can knowing is_quadratic and ticket_cost enable attackers to calculate voting costs and manipulate outcomes? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetLatestVotingResult] [Snapshot Timing] Does querying immediately after TakeSnapshot() reveal whether the sponsor is actively managing the voting item? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotedItems] [Active vs Withdrawn Analysis] Can analyzing the ratio of active to withdrawn votes reveal voter confidence or strategic behavior? (Low)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Vote/ViewMethods.cs] [GetVotingResult] [VotersCount Leak] Does exposing voters_count enable determining average vote amount and identifying large individual votes? (Medium)
